sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: So Will started running, but the more he runs, the more he remembers. He doesn’t want to remember anything.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: He keeps on running. His leg is tired. And he’s out of breath. But he keeps on running.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: He runs until he reaches one of the places that’s so important to him and his leg stops

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: This is the last place he would want to be right now.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: It’s a tree. Or more precisely. . . The tree where they become whole.
